name: Noriaki Nakata
profile:
CMO of SBINFT
From event execution to research, a lot of roles have been accomplished in the NFT community. Starting off as a researcher & translator in NFTs, later moves on as a Event Organizer to push the boundaries in the Japanese community. After joining the nanakusa team, working together with 190 artists and partners have been a big part of the activities ,utilizing the great technology and art to find the solution for what the Japanese community have been struggling. Crypto Art which consists of Art, Vision, and Blockchain Technology, is the passion and interest to the future.
Organizer of CAWA in TOKYO & CRYPTO ART FES 2022
Translator (ENGâ‡”JPN), NFT Analyst
Planner & Translator of TEAM NAGOMI
Member of 8DAO

name: Sota Watanabe
profile: Co-founder and CEO at Phi. Our mission is to visualize on-chain identity and create an open and inclusive metaverse land system that is based on universal web3 building blocks, such as ENS domains and wallet activity.

name: Shugo Tsuji
profile: Co-founder and CEO at Phi. Our mission is to visualize on-chain identity and create an open and inclusive metaverse land system that is based on universal web3 building blocks, such as ENS domains and wallet activity.

name: Shun Kakinoki
profile: I am a builder, hacker, & pioneer striving to obliterate the galaxy. I have spent my childhood years in Silicon Valley (Cupertino City) from 4 to 10 years old and have 3+ years of experience in AI/CV/DL, web development & and cloud infrastructure (especially DevOps). Love open source and excited about the potential of startups & Web 3.0 towards the future of the world.
